mapper.sql: id, ship_id AS shipId, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, `location`, agency_detail AS agencyDetail, agency_url AS agencyUrl, loi_url AS loiUrl, select_status AS selectStatus, op_id AS opId, public_status AS publicStatus, create_date AS createDate, create_by AS createBy, update_date AS updateDate, update_by AS updateBy, del_flag AS delFlag, quotation_application_id AS quotationApplicationId ,total_price AS totalPrice ,op_name AS opName ,surveyor_name AS surveyorName
